transcript:
At that toast, the count took out his handkerchief and, covering his face, wept outright. 
PIERRE SAT OPPOSITE D61okhov and Nicholas Rost6v. As usual, he ate and drank much, and eagerly. But those who knew him intimately noticed that some great change had come over him that day. He was silent all through dinner and looked about, blinking and scowling, or, with fixed eyes and a look of complete absent- mindedness, kept rubbing the bridge of his nose.
